tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE robot_info (
    robot_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    robot_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    configuration JSON,
    status_updates JSON,
    created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE robot_configurations (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  robot_name TEXT UNIQUE,
  model_number TEXT,
  year_manufactured INT,
  configuration JSONB
);

CREATE TABLE robot_tasks (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  task_name TEXT,
  task_description TEXT,
  task_status TEXT,
  task_priority INT,
  start_time TIMESTAMP,
  end_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE RobotConfigurations (
  robot_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  robot_name VARCHAR(50),
  serial_number VARCHAR(20),
  configuration_details JSON
)

CREATE TABLE RobotStatus (
  status_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  robot_id INT,
  status_message TEXT,
  battery_level FLOAT,
  last_update TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE RobotErrors (
  error_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  robot_id INT,
  error_message TEXT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE RobotLogs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  robot_id INT,
  log_message TEXT,
  log_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE Robot_Configurations (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    configuration TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE Robot_Status (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    robot_id INT,
    status VARCHAR(20),
    battery_level INT,
    last_updated TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE Robot_Events (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_type VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT,
    event_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE Robot_Errors (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    error_code INT,
    error_description TEXT,
    occurred_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE Robot_Logs (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    log_type VARCHAR(50),
    log_message TEXT,
    logged_at TIMESTAMP
)
